patthana15.7:1.1: Hetuṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.7:2.1: Hetuṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.7:3.1: Hetuṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
